trans-unit.source: Provides information associated with health events.
trans-unit.target: 提供與健康事件關聯的資訊。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 健康監視，可讓管理已部署的 Web 應用程式的生產環境和作業人員。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management?displayProperty=nameWithType>命名空間包含負責封裝應用程式健全狀況狀態資料和負責處理此資料提供者類型的健全狀況事件型別。

trans-unit.source: It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events.
trans-unit.target: 它也會包含有助於管理健全狀況事件的支援型別。

trans-unit.source: Instances of the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationInformation> class contain information that is obtained using any of the types derived from the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebManagementEvent> type.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationInformation>類別包含使用任何一種衍生自取得的資訊<xref:System.Web.Management.WebManagementEvent>型別。

trans-unit.source: Your application needs the appropriate permissions to access protected information provided by this type.
trans-unit.target: 您的應用程式需要存取受保護的資訊，此類型所提供的適當權限。

trans-unit.source: The following is an excerpt of a configuration file you could use to enable ASP.NET to log error events that contain application information.
trans-unit.target: 以下是組態檔，您可以使用包含應用程式資訊的記錄檔錯誤事件中啟用 ASP.NET 的摘錄。

trans-unit.source: In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section.
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下您將能夠實作時，使用 ASP.NET 健康監視類型，而您會藉由指定的值控制健全狀況監視系統`healthMonitoring`組態區段。

trans-unit.source: You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以衍生自健全狀況監視類型的類型來建立您自己的自訂事件和提供者。

trans-unit.source: For an example of creating a custom event class, see the example provided in this topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需建立自訂的事件類別的範例，請參閱本主題中所提供的範例。

trans-unit.source: The following code example has two parts.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例有兩個部分。

trans-unit.source: The first part is an excerpt of the configuration file that enables ASP.NET to use a custom event.
trans-unit.target: 第一個部分是組態檔可讓 ASP.NET 使用自訂事件的摘錄。

trans-unit.source: The second shows how to create that custom event by using the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationInformation> class.
trans-unit.target: 第二個示範如何建立自訂事件使用<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationInformation>類別。

trans-unit.source: Ensure that your custom event is raised at the proper time, that is, when the equivalent system health event it replaces would be raised.
trans-unit.target: 請確定您的自訂事件在引發適當的時間，也就是時就會引發取代的對等系統健全狀況事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current application domain name.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前應用程式定義域名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the application domain name.
trans-unit.target: 取得應用程式定義域名稱。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to obtain the application domain name.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得應用程式定義域名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the application physical path.
trans-unit.target: 取得應用程式實體路徑。

trans-unit.source: The application physical path.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式實體路徑。

trans-unit.source: This property requires appropriate permissions to be accessed.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性需要存取的適當權限。

trans-unit.source: Refer to the Permissions section.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱權限 區段。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to obtain the application physical path.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得應用程式實體路徑。

trans-unit.source: Gets the application logical path.
trans-unit.target: 取得應用程式邏輯路徑。

trans-unit.source: The application logical path.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式邏輯路徑。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to obtain the application logical path.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得應用程式邏輯路徑。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WebEventFormatter" /> that contains the tab and indentation settings used to format the Web health event information.
trans-unit.target: 包含用來將 Web 健康情況事件資訊格式化之定位和縮排設定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WebEventFormatter" />。

trans-unit.source: Formats the application information.
trans-unit.target: 格式化應用程式資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationInformation.FormatToString%2A> method provides a uniform format for event information, which is useful if the event data must be logged and later presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationInformation.FormatToString%2A>方法可為事件的資訊，這非常有用，如果事件資料必須記錄，並向使用者顯示更新版本提供統一的格式。

trans-unit.source: It is called internally when the provider invokes one of the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent.ToString%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 它時，內部呼叫提供者會叫用的其中一個<xref:System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent.ToString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When formatting your custom event information for display, override the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationInformation.FormatToString%2A> method rather than the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationInformation.ToString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 當格式化顯示您自訂的事件資訊，會覆寫<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationInformation.FormatToString%2A>方法而非<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationInformation.ToString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This will avoid overwriting or tampering with sensitive system information.
trans-unit.target: 這會避免覆寫或竄改機密的系統資訊。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to format custom information.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定自訂資訊的格式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the application machine name.
trans-unit.target: 取得應用程式電腦名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the machine where the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 執行應用程式的電腦名稱。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to obtain the machine name.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得電腦名稱。

trans-unit.source: Formats event information for display purposes.
trans-unit.target: 針對顯示用途，格式化事件資訊。

trans-unit.source: The event information.
trans-unit.target: 事件資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent.ToString%2A> method formats event information by calling the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationInformation.FormatToString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent.ToString%2A>方法藉由呼叫格式化事件資訊<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationInformation.FormatToString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When formatting your custom event information for display, override the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationInformation.FormatToString%2A> method rather than this <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationInformation.ToString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 當格式化顯示您自訂的事件資訊，會覆寫<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationInformation.FormatToString%2A>方法，而這<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationInformation.ToString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This will avoid overwriting or tampering with sensitive system information.
trans-unit.target: 這會避免覆寫或竄改機密的系統資訊。

trans-unit.source: For an example of using the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationInformation.ToString%2A> method, see <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 如需使用<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationInformation.ToString%2A>方法，請參閱<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the application trust level.
trans-unit.target: 取得應用程式信任層級。

trans-unit.source: The application trust level.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式信任層級。

trans-unit.source: This property requires appropriate permissions to be accessed.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性需要存取的適當權限。

trans-unit.source: Refer to the Permissions section.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱權限 區段。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to obtain the application-trust-level information.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何取得應用程式信任層級資訊。
